Title: LoRaWAN速 with Azure IoT operations
Summary: This Drop implements a solution that takes data from LoRaWAN速 based system and devices and then pushes it to the cloud using Azure IoT Operations.
Description: Implementing a solution that takes data from LoRaWAN速 based system and then pushes it to Azure IoT Operations. This is done using a custom broker that understands LoRaWAN速 communication data and talks to Azure IoT operations using MQTT and port forwarding using a broker listener.
